Dana Loesch blamed Botham Jean for not being armed when he was shot in his apartment.

Let me repeat that.

DANA LOESCH BLAMED AN INNOCENT MAN FOR BEING MURDERED!

When she'll eventually arrive in hell uninvited, I hope Satan will have a gun to welcome her.
I forced a bot to watch over 1,000 hours of Trump rallies and then asked it to write a Trump rally of its own. Here is the first page. https://t.co/BxbWgMJozH

They’ll kill you & say you had weed in your apartment.

They’ll kill you & say you were “no angel.”

They’ll kill you & say you put a middle finger up on your instagram.

They’ll kill you & say they thought your wallet was a gun.

They’ll kill you & always try to find a reason.

24 years ago today President Clinton signed our Assault Weapons Ban into law. Over the next 10 years there were 37% fewer gun massacres and 43% fewer gun massacre deaths. But in the 10 years after the ban expired in 2004, gun massacre deaths rose by 239%. #EnoughIsEnough
Just spoken to a guy whose shoot has been the subject of a campaign of sabotage and criminal damage. The Police response: to come to his house for a firearms security visit!

Let's talk about Brett Kavanaugh's past rulings on guns. He's out of the mainstream, even among other conservative judges, in his willingness to strike down legislatures' public safety measures to prevent gun violence if they don't align with his politics.
